text: A very basic question: In ReverseDiff and Zygote are we also supposed to call something like zero_grad() in PyTorch in order to clear previous gradients or are they not summed up?

elements.text: A very basic question: In ReverseDiff and Zygote are we also supposed to call something like zero_grad() in PyTorch in order to clear previous gradients or are they not summed up?

text:
There is no such operation in Zgyote.
idk about ReverseDiff
